author: nflaig
content: do we wanna deprecate https://ethereum.github.io/beacon-APIs/#/Beacon/getDepositSnapshot as part of Electra release or is there any use case to keep this api around after `state.eth1_deposit_index == state.deposit_requests_start_index`? this would allow us to completely remove it in Fulu

author: tersec
content: in favor of deprecating, for that reason
